verses.verse: In the mean time, when there were <S%G1996>gathered<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%> an <S%G3461>innumerable<s%> <S%G3461>multitude<s%> of <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G2662>stepped<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> on <S%G240>another,<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> of all, <S%G4337>Beware<s%> you of the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is hypocrisy. <S%G5272><s%>
For there is <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4780>covered,<s%> that shall not be <S%G601>revealed;<s%> neither <S%G2927>hid,<s%> that shall not be known. <S%G1097><s%>

Therefore <S%G473><s%> <S%G5607><s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> you have <S%G2036>spoken<s%> in <S%G4655>darkness<s%> shall be <S%G191>heard<s%> in the <S%G5457>light;<s%> and that <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> in the <S%G3775>ear<s%> in <S%G5009>closets<s%> shall be <S%G2784>proclaimed<s%> on the housetops. <S%G1430><s%>

And I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you my <S%G5384>friends,<s%> Be not <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of them that <S%G615>kill<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> that <S%G2192>have<s%> no <S%G3365><s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G4055>more<s%> that they <S%G1410>can<s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

But I will <S%G5263>forewarn<s%> you <S%G5101>whom<s%> you shall <S%G5399>fear:<s%> <S%G5399>Fear<s%> him, which <S%G3326>after<s%> he has <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G1685>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1067>hell;<s%> <S%G3483>yes,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G5399>Fear<s%> him.

Are not <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G4765>sparrows<s%> <S%G4453>sold<s%> for <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G787>farthings,<s%> and not <S%G1520>one<s%> of them is <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2532>very<s%> <S%G2359>hairs<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G705>numbered.<s%> <S%G5399>Fear<s%> not <S%G3767>therefore:<s%> you are of <S%G1308>more<s%> <S%G1308>value<s%> than <S%G4183>many<s%> sparrows. <S%G4765><s%>

<S%G1161>Also<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>Whoever<s%> shall <S%G3670>confess<s%> me <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> him shall the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>
But he that <S%G720>denies<s%> me <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> shall be <S%G533>denied<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> shall <S%G2046>speak<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man,<s%> it shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> him: but to him that <S%G987>blasphemes<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> it shall not be forgiven. <S%G863><s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G4374>bring<s%> you to the <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and to <S%G746>magistrates,<s%> and <S%G1849>powers,<s%> take you <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3309>thought<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> thing you shall <S%G626>answer,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall say: <S%G2036><s%>
For the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> shall <S%G1321>teach<s%> you in the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to say. <S%G2036><s%>

And <S%G5100>one<s%> of the <S%G3793>company<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G2036>speak<s%> to my <S%G80>brother,<s%> that he <S%G3307>divide<s%> the <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> with me.
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G444>Man,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2525>made<s%> me a <S%G1348>judge<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3312>divider<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> you?

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, Take <S%G3708>heed,<s%> and <S%G5442>beware<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness:<s%> for a <S%G5100>man's<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2076>consists<s%> not in the <S%G4052>abundance<s%> of the things which he possesses. <S%G5224><s%>

And he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G5561>ground<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2164>brought<s%> <S%G2164>forth<s%> plentifully: <S%G2164><s%>

And he <S%G1260>thought<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall I <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> room <S%G4226>where<s%> to <S%G4863>bestow<s%> my fruits? <S%G2590><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5124>This<s%> will I <S%G4160>do:<s%> I will <S%G2507>pull<s%> <S%G2507>down<s%> my <S%G596>barns,<s%> and <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3187>greater;<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> will I <S%G4863>bestow<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> my <S%G1081>fruits<s%> and my goods. <S%G18><s%>

And I will <S%G2046>say<s%> to my <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G5590>Soul,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G18>goods<s%> <S%G2749>laid<s%> up for <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2094>years;<s%> take your <S%G373>ease,<s%> <S%G5315>eat,<s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%> and be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

But <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You <S%G878>fool,<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> your <S%G5590>soul<s%> shall be <S%G523>required<s%> of you: <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G5101>whose<s%> shall those things be, <S%G3739>which<s%> you have provided? <S%G2090><s%>
So <S%G3779><s%> is he that lays up <S%G2343>treasure<s%> for <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and is not <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, Take <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3309>thought<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G5315>eat;<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> for the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G1746>put<s%> on. <S%G1746><s%>
The <S%G5590>life<s%> is <S%G4119>more<s%> than <S%G5160>meat,<s%> and the body <S%G4983><s%> is more than raiment. <S%G1742><s%>

<S%G2657>Consider<s%> the <S%G2876>ravens:<s%> for they <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G4687>sow<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G2325>reap;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G5009>storehouse<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G596>barn;<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5142>feeds<s%> them: <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> are you <S%G1308>better<s%> than the fowls? <S%G4071><s%>
And <S%G5101>which<s%> of you with taking <S%G3309>thought<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4369>add<s%> to his <S%G2244>stature<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> cubit? <S%G4083><s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G3767>then<s%> be not <S%G1410>able<s%> to do that thing which is <S%G1646>least,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> take you <S%G3309>thought<s%> for the rest? <S%G3062><s%>

<S%G2657>Consider<s%> the <S%G2918>lilies<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> they <S%G837>grow:<s%> they <S%G2872>toil<s%> not, they <S%G3514>spin<s%> not; and yet I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G4672>Solomon<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G1391>glory<s%> was not <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of these. <S%G5130><s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G294>clothe<s%> the <S%G5528>grass,<s%> which is to <S%G4594>day<s%> in the <S%G68>field,<s%> and to <S%G839>morrow<s%> is <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2823>oven;<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>much<s%> more <S%G3123><s%> will he clothe you, O you of <S%G3640>little<s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%>
And <S%G2212>seek<s%> not you <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G5315>eat,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> you shall <S%G4095>drink,<s%> <S%G3361>neither<s%> be you of <S%G3349>doubtful<s%> mind.

For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things do the <S%G1484>nations<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1934>seek<s%> <S%G1934>after:<s%> and <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> that you have <S%G5535>need<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> things.
But <S%G4133>rather<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> you the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall be <S%G4369>added<s%> to you.
<S%G5399>Fear<s%> not, <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G4168>flock;<s%> for it is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father's<s%> good <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> you the kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

<S%G4453>Sell<s%> that you <S%G5224>have,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1654>alms;<s%> <S%G4160>provide<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G905>bags<s%> which <S%G3822>wax<s%> not <S%G3822>old,<s%> a <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> that <S%G413>fails<s%> not, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1448>approaches,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G4597>moth<s%> corrupts. <S%G1311><s%>
For <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> will <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>
Let <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3751>loins<s%> be <S%G4024>girded<s%> <S%G4024>about,<s%> and <S%G3588>your<s%> <S%G3088>lights<s%> burning; <S%G2545><s%>

And you yourselves <S%G3664>like<s%> to <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G4327>wait<s%> for their <S%G2962>lord,<s%> <S%G4218>when<s%> he will <S%G360>return<s%> from the <S%G1062>wedding;<s%> that when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> and <S%G2925>knocks,<s%> they may <S%G455>open<s%> to him immediately. <S%G2112><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G1401>servants,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>lord<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G1127>watching:<s%> <S%G281>truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that he shall <S%G4024>gird<s%> himself, and <S%G347>make<s%> them to <S%G347>sit<s%> <S%G347>down<s%> to meat, and will <S%G3928>come<s%> <S%G3928>forth<s%> and <S%G1247>serve<s%> them.

And <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G5438>watch,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> in the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5438>watch,<s%> and find <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G3779>so,<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> are <S%G1565>those<s%> servants. <S%G1401><s%>

And <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1097>know,<s%> that <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G3611>manager<s%> of the <S%G3617>house<s%> had <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> the <S%G2812>thief<s%> would <S%G2064>come,<s%> he would have <S%G1127>watched,<s%> and not have <S%G863>suffered<s%> his <S%G3624>house<s%> to be <S%G1358>broken<s%> through. <S%G1358><s%>
Be you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2092>ready<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> at an <S%G5610>hour<s%> when you <S%G1380>think<s%> not.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3004>speak<s%> you <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to us, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3956>all?<s%>

And the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> is that <S%G4103>faithful<s%> and <S%G5429>wise<s%> <S%G3623>steward,<s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> shall <S%G2525>make<s%> <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G2322>household,<s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> them their <S%G4620>portion<s%> of <S%G4620>meat<s%> in due season? <S%G2540><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> his <S%G2962>lord<s%> when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> doing. <S%G4160><s%>
Of a <S%G230>truth<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that he will <S%G2525>make<s%> him <S%G2525>ruler<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that he has. <S%G5224><s%>

But and <S%G1437>if<s%> that <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G2036>say<s%> in his <S%G2588>heart,<s%> My <S%G2962>lord<s%> <S%G5549>delays<s%> his <S%G2064>coming;<s%> and shall <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G5180>beat<s%> the <S%G3816>menservants<s%> and <S%G3814>maidens,<s%> and to <S%G2068>eat<s%> and <S%G4095>drink,<s%> and to be drunken; <S%G3182><s%>

The <S%G2962>lord<s%> of that <S%G1401>servant<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%> when he <S%G4328>looks<s%> not for him, and <S%G1722>at<s%> an <S%G5610>hour<s%> when he is not <S%G1097>aware,<s%> and will <S%G1371>cut<s%> him in sunder, and will <S%G5087>appoint<s%> him his <S%G3313>portion<s%> with the unbelievers. <S%G571><s%>

And that <S%G1401>servant,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> his <S%G2962>lord's<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> and <S%G2090>prepared<s%> not himself, <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G4314>according<s%> to his <S%G2307>will,<s%> shall be <S%G1194>beaten<s%> with many <S%G4183><s%> stripes.

But he that <S%G1097>knew<s%> not, and did <S%G4160>commit<s%> things <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G4127>stripes,<s%> shall be <S%G1194>beaten<s%> with few <S%G3641><s%> <S%G4127>stripes.<s%> For to whomsoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> is <S%G1325>given,<s%> of him shall be <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2212>required:<s%> and to <S%G3739>whom<s%> men have <S%G3908>committed<s%> <S%G4183>much,<s%> of him they will <S%G154>ask<s%> the more. <S%G4055><s%>

I am <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G906>send<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> I, <S%G1487>if<s%> it be <S%G2235>already<s%> kindled? <S%G381><s%>
But I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G908>baptism<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> with; and <S%G4459>how<s%> am I <S%G4912>straitened<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> it be accomplished! <S%G5055><s%>
